news.title: Pakistan Launches New Digital Policy
news.description: Government has announced a new digital policy to boost IT exports and startups.
news.content: The new digital policy focuses on freelancing, software exports, and youth training programs across Pakistan.
news.author: Ahmed Raza

news.title: Karachi Weather Update: Heavy Rain Expected
news.description: Met Office warns of heavy rainfall in Karachi over the next 48 hours.
news.content: Citizens are advised to avoid unnecessary travel and follow safety guidelines issued by authorities.
news.author: Staff Reporter

news.title: Pakistan Wins T20 Series Against Australia
news.description: Pakistan secures series victory with an outstanding performance.
news.content: The national team showed strong batting and bowling throughout the series.
news.author: Sports Desk

news.title: New Smartphone Launched with AI Features
news.description: A leading tech company has launched a smartphone powered by AI.
news.content: The phone includes AI camera enhancements, smart battery optimization, and voice features.
news.author: Tech Team
